title: Modular Practical Programming Education Based on High-Performance Computing (HPC)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational C/C++ programming skills and understanding of parallel processing concepts
context.additional_context: A course focusing on parallel computing practice utilizing GPUs in a BYOD environment, including case studies on social field data processing

learning_goals: Three or more GPU-accelerated codes can be implemented using the OpenACC/OpenMP offloading model.
The ability to optimize CPU-GPU heterogeneous systems through the HIP programming model is cultivated.
A project applying HPC technology to real-world social issues (population analysis/climate modeling, etc.) is completed.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
